actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to provide a procedure through which certain criminal cases can be transferred to new judges.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to require that a criminal case in a Federal district court having three or more judges in regular active service be reassigned if all defendants in such case jointly file timely notice.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to provide a procedure through which certain criminal cases can be transferred to new judges.
